title: Crossword Puzzle Answers
html:
Crossword Puzzle Answers

Across

1. HER-O-IN-E.
5. MA(CAB)RE.
9. SUSHI (hidden).
10. P(A-RENT)AGE.
11. ALLEGRO (anag.).
12. H(AIRC)UT (CAR I anag.).
13. IRENE CASTLE (anag.).
18. FRE(D A-STAIR)E.
21. RADI(C)AL.
23. K(NOW)ING.
25. STEV-EDORE (VEST anag.; ERODE rev.).
26. EXI(S)T.
27. DEB-A-TES (SET A BED rev.).
28. STAN-D IN.

Down

1. HIS-PANIC.
2. RESOLVED (anag.).
3. I-RING.
4. ESPIONAGE (anag.).
5. MARCH (two meanings).
6. CONT(IN)ENT.
7. B-RANCH.
8. ERECTS (anag.).
14. EFFI(CI)ENT (FIFTEEN anag.).
15. THANKLESS (hidden).
16. CITIFIED (anag.).
17. H(EIGHT)EN.
19. ERAS-ED.
20. ADVERB (anag.).
22. LOOTS (rev.).
24. O-PER-A.
